summary: After being used and betrayed by the detective she had fallen in love with, young Matsu is sent to a female prison full of sadistic guards and disobedient prisoners.
cast: Meiko Kaji|Rie Yokoyama|Yayoi Watanabe|Yôko Mihara|Akemi Negishi|Keiko Kuni|Yumiko Katayama|Emi Jô|Sue Mitobe|Chie Kobayashi|Rie Yuki|Hideo Murota|Saburô Date|Shinzô Hotta|Yôichi Numata|Takeo Kamura|Shiro Hisano|Takashi Hio|Kôji Fujiyama|Kôji Miemachi|Nenji Kobayashi|Toshiyuki Tsuchiyama|Tako Hachirô|Hideko Oda|Kaoru Sono|Sayoko Tanimoto|Keiko Itô|Kiyome Takemura|Midori Yamamoto|Toshie Kokabu|Hisako Yaohara|Lily Tachibana|Sumie Tachibana|Fumie Shô|Mayumi Yoshida|Misa Kôno|Yuki Watanabe|Keiko Tsuzuki|Jun Aida|Kôichi Yamada|Tadashi Takatsuki|Chikara Gonoue|Osamu Kimura|Jirô Sagawa|Takeshige Hatanaka|Haruki Jô|Teruo Shimizu|Hisao Mizoguchi|Sakae Yamaura|Isao Natsuyagi|Fumio Watanabe|Hiroko Ôgi
title: Joshû 701-gô: Sasori
